result.title: Taste of the Draft to Deliver Community Impact for Western Pennsylvania Children
result.text: GENYOUth, the NFL, Pittsburgh Steelers, VisitPITTSBURGH, PNC Bank, Pittsburgh Public Schools Announce Community Impact Initiative to Support Student Nutrition, Physical Activity PITTSBURGH , Dec. 15, 2025 /PRNewswire/ --GENYOUth, the national nonprofit organization dedicated to helping schoolchildren live well-nourished and physically active lives, joined Pittsburgh Allegheny 6-8, purpose-driven partners and Steelers great Maurkice Pouncey today to kick off a major community impact initiative aligned with the 2026 NFL Draft. The effort will help tackle student food insecurity and expand opportunities for physical activity for children across Western Pennsylvania.

result.title: PNC's 2025 Christmas Price Index: Holiday Cheer Comes at a Premium!
result.text: PNC calculates the cost of Christmas from the holiday song "The Twelve Days of Christmas" Five gold rings make the single-biggest price jump Recent inflation trends are repeating, much like the verses of the song itself Five of the 12 gifts had no increase compared to 2024 PITTSBURGH , Nov. 24, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- The cost of celebrating Christmas is climbing again. Now in its 42nd year, the PNC Christmas Price Index (PNC CPI) reveals that the cost of the gifts from the classic holiday carol "The Twelve Days of Christmas" has risen 4.5% compared to last year, outpacing the Bureau of Labor Statistics' Consumer Price Index (BLS CPI) October year-over-year reading of 3.0%.

result.title: PNC Bank Increases New Branch Openings to More Than 300 by 2030
result.text: Expanding in Eight Additional Markets Including Nashville and Chicago PITTSBURGH , Nov. 7, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- PNC today announced it will be opening more than 300 new branches by 2030, adding 100 new branches to the expansion plans announced last November and increasing its total branch investment to approximately $2 billion. result.title: Lynch Carpenter Investigates Claims in PNC Data Breach
result.text: PITTSBURGH, Sept. 25, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- PNC Financial Services (PNC), a Pennsylvania-based bank with over 2,200 branches nationwide,1 recently announced a cybersecurity incident, which impacted the personal information of hundreds of thousands of individuals. In the incident, a cybercriminal hacker may have accessed records with personally identifiable information (PII) including names, addresses, Social Security numbers and account numbers.
